pages.text: Stats:$(br)15x $(#f00)♥$()$(br)Base Attack Damage: 4$(br2)Stats(When Tamed):$(br)30x $(#f00)♥$()$(br)Base Attack Damage: 8$(br2)Abilities:$(br)Radioactive Bite, Irradiated Excrement$(br2)$(br)Radioactive Bite:$(br)When the radioactive corgi attacks it puts radiation on it's target.$(br2)Irradiated Excrement:$(br)When the radioactive corgi is fed and tamed it'll produce uranium as a result.

pages.name: Radioactive Corgi
pages.text: The radioactive corgi was born in the heart of a meltdown, now trying to figure out it's new powers.
